article: Everyone has a hobby. Many people think that stamp collecting is very interesting.  _  ? First, they think they can learn many  _  things from stamps because stamps have  _  of people, animals and countries on them. For example, if you have all the stamps  _  the Olympic Games, you can learn a lot about the different  _  . Second, stamps can  _  people a lot of pleasure. People share their stamps with  others  and many stamp collectors become good friends. Special stamps are  also  very popular. People like to  _  special stamps because they can make lots of money in the future by  _  them. Do you want to collect stamps?
